import React from 'react' import moment from 'moment' import '../components.css' import AddToCartButton from './AddToCartButton.js' const SingleBookComponent = ({book}) => { return(
{book.title}

Price: {book.price}

Posted by {book.postedByFirstName + ' ' + book.postedByLastName}

{moment(book.createdAt.toDate()).calendar()}

) } export default SingleBookComponent
